title: 2003 La Flèche Wallonne
text: The 2003 La Flèche Wallonne was the 67th edition of <a href="La%20Fl%C3%A8che%20Wallonne">La Flèche Wallonne</a> cycle race and was held on 23 April 2003. The race started in <a href="Charleroi">Charleroi</a> and finished in <a href="Huy">Huy</a>. The race was won by <a href="Igor%20Astarloa">Igor Astarloa</a> of the <a href="Saeco%20%28cycling%20team%29">Saeco</a> team.
